CustomField.description: Calc field for data studio to mark the date the KPI was missed
CustomField.formula: IF( Time_To_Account_Conv_KPI_Met__c =0, (IF(CONTAINS( TEXT(Custodian__c) , "Schwab"), OPD_PRR_Completed__c +36, OPD_PRR_Completed__c +21)), null)
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Calc field for data studio to mark the date the KPI was missed
CustomField.label: Time To Account Conv KPI Missed
